docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
Causal Decision Model Causal Decision Model

(DRAFT) -- Represents a Causal Decision Model for OpenDI-compliant services.

All of
  • Base Asset Properties
  • CDM Properties
root allOf Base Asset PropertiesBase Asset PropertiesType: object uuid Required root allOf Base Asset Properties uuidType: string

Unique identifier for this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ name root allOf Base Asset Properties nameNameType: string

The human-readable name for this asset.

summary root allOf Base Asset Properties summarySummaryType: string

Longer description of the asset.

documentation root allOf Base Asset Properties documentationDocumentationType: object

Full documentation for the asset/element/model.

content Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation contentType: string MIMEType Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation MIMETypeType: string version root allOf Base Asset Properties versionAsset VersionType: string

Version number for the asset.

creator root allOf Base Asset Properties creatorCreatorType: string

Unique identifier for this asset's creator.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ createdDate root allOf Base Asset Properties createdDateCreation DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was created.

updator root allOf Base Asset Properties updatorUpdatorType: string

Unique identifier for the user that most recently updated this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ updatedDate root allOf Base Asset Properties updatedDateLast Updated DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was most recently updated.

root allOf CDM PropertiesCDM PropertiesType: object status root allOf CDM Properties statusModel StatusType: enum (of string) Default: "Draft"

Draft/version status of the model.

Must be one of:
  • "Draft"
  • "Simulation-Ready"
  • "Custom"
customStatus root allOf CDM Properties customStatusCustom StatusType: string

If 'type' is set to 'Custom', use this to specify the custom status name.

partialRetrieval root allOf CDM Properties partialRetrievalPartial RetrievalType: enum (of null or string) Default: null

When retrieving this CDM, tells what kind of partial data was retrieved. null means full model was retrieved.

Must be one of:
  • "Evaluation-Only"
  • "Diagram-Only"
  • null
elements root allOf CDM Properties elementsCausal Decision ElementsType: array

The decision elements that make up the decision model.

No Additional ItemsEach item of this array must be: root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision ElementDecision ElementType: object

Holds evaluation and visual data for a decision element.

All of
  • Base Asset Properties
  • Decision Element Properties
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Base Asset PropertiesBase Asset PropertiesType: object uuid Required root allOf Base Asset Properties uuidType: string

Unique identifier for this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ name root allOf Base Asset Properties nameNameType: string

The human-readable name for this asset.

summary root allOf Base Asset Properties summarySummaryType: string

Longer description of the asset.

documentation root allOf Base Asset Properties documentationDocumentationType: object

Full documentation for the asset/element/model.

content Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation contentType: string MIMEType Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation MIMETypeType: string version root allOf Base Asset Properties versionAsset VersionType: string

Version number for the asset.

creator root allOf Base Asset Properties creatorCreatorType: string

Unique identifier for this asset's creator.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ createdDate root allOf Base Asset Properties createdDateCreation DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was created.

updator root allOf Base Asset Properties updatorUpdatorType: string

Unique identifier for the user that most recently updated this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ updatedDate root allOf Base Asset Properties updatedDateLast Updated DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was most recently updated.

root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element PropertiesDecision Element PropertiesType: object type root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties typeType (Role)Type: enum (of string) Default: "Custom"

The type/role of the decision element.

Must be one of:
  • "Lever"
  • "Intermediate"
  • "Outcome"
  • "External"
  • "Goal"
  • "Custom"
customType root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties customTypeCustom Type NameType: string

If 'type' is set to 'Custom', use this to specify the custom type name.

evaluation root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluationEvaluation DataType: object

Data for simulating the decision element.

The following properties are required:
  • defaultValue
evaluatable root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable One of
  • Script
  • API URL
  • Binary Base64
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf ScriptScriptType: object

Script attached to a decision element. Runs during simulation.

evalType root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Script evalTypeType: const Specific value: "Script" content root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Script contentType: string language root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Script languageType: enum (of string) Must be one of:
  • "lang1"
  • "lang2"
  • "lang3"
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf API URLAPI URLType: object

URL for an API endpoint, called during simulation.

evalType root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf API URL evalTypeType: const Specific value: "API URL" content root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf API URL contentType: stringFormat: uri Must match regular expression: ((http|https)://)(www.)?[a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#?&//=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#?&//=]*) payload root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf API URL payloadType: object root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Binary Base64Binary Base64Type: object

Binary object encoded in Base64.

evalType root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Binary Base64 evalTypeType: const Specific value: "Binary Base64" content root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties evaluation evaluatable oneOf Binary Base64 contentType: string The following properties are required:
  • evalType
  • content
diagram root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagramDiagram DataType: object

Data for rendering the decision element.

position Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram positionType: object x Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram position xType: number Default: 0 y Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram position yType: number Default: 0 boundingBoxSize Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram boundingBoxSizeType: object width Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram boundingBoxSize widthType: number Default: 400 height Required root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties diagram boundingBoxSize heightType: number Default: 300 assets root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties assetsType: array

List of references (by UUID) of decision assets associated with this decision element.

No Additional ItemsEach item of this array must be: root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element allOf Decision Element Properties assets uuidType: string

UUID of the decision asset associated with this causal dependency.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ Any of
  • Eval
  • Dia
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element anyOf EvalEvalType: object

Element must have evaluation or diagram data, or both.

The following properties are required:
  • evaluation
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element anyOf DiaDiaType: object

Element must have evaluation or diagram data, or both.

The following properties are required:
  • diagram
Conditional Subschema

If the conditions in the "If" tab are respected, then the conditions in the "Then" tab should be respected. Otherwise, the conditions in the "Else" tab should be respected.

  • If
  • Then
root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element ifType: object type root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element if typeType: const Specific value: "Custom" root allOf CDM Properties elements Decision Element thenType: object The following properties are required:
  • customType
The following properties are required:
  • name
  • type
dependencies root allOf CDM Properties dependenciesCausal DependenciesType: array

The dependency links between decision elements. These are the arrows in the model's CDD.

No Additional ItemsEach item of this array must be: root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal DependencyCausal DependencyType: object

Holds references (by UUID) to a directed causal link between two decision elements.

All of
  • Base Asset Properties
  • Causal Dependency Properties
root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Base Asset PropertiesBase Asset PropertiesType: object uuid Required root allOf Base Asset Properties uuidType: string

Unique identifier for this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ name root allOf Base Asset Properties nameNameType: string

The human-readable name for this asset.

summary root allOf Base Asset Properties summarySummaryType: string

Longer description of the asset.

documentation root allOf Base Asset Properties documentationDocumentationType: object

Full documentation for the asset/element/model.

content Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation contentType: string MIMEType Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation MIMETypeType: string version root allOf Base Asset Properties versionAsset VersionType: string

Version number for the asset.

creator root allOf Base Asset Properties creatorCreatorType: string

Unique identifier for this asset's creator.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ createdDate root allOf Base Asset Properties createdDateCreation DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was created.

updator root allOf Base Asset Properties updatorUpdatorType: string

Unique identifier for the user that most recently updated this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ updatedDate root allOf Base Asset Properties updatedDateLast Updated DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was most recently updated.

root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Causal Dependency PropertiesCausal Dependency PropertiesType: object source root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Causal Dependency Properties sourceSource ElementType: string

UUID of the source element.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ target root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Causal Dependency Properties targetTarget ElementType: string

UUID of the target element.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ assets root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Causal Dependency Properties assetsType: array

List of references (by UUID) of decision assets associated with this causal dependency.

No Additional ItemsEach item of this array must be: root allOf CDM Properties dependencies Causal Dependency allOf Causal Dependency Properties assets uuidType: string

UUID of the decision asset associated with this causal dependency.

Same definition as uuid The following properties are required:
  • source
  • target
modelAssets root allOf CDM Properties modelAssetsModel AssetsType: array

Holds full data for all assets associated with elements/dependencies in this model.

No Additional ItemsEach item of this array must be: root allOf CDM Properties modelAssets Decision AssetDecision AssetType: object

Holds data for a decision asset, likely retrieved separately by UUID.

All of
  • Base Asset Properties
  • Decision Asset Properties

Unique identifier for this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ name root allOf Base Asset Properties nameNameType: string

The human-readable name for this asset.

summary root allOf Base Asset Properties summarySummaryType: string

Longer description of the asset.

documentation root allOf Base Asset Properties documentationDocumentationType: object

Full documentation for the asset/element/model.

content Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation contentType: string MIMEType Required root allOf Base Asset Properties documentation MIMETypeType: string version root allOf Base Asset Properties versionAsset VersionType: string

Version number for the asset.

creator root allOf Base Asset Properties creatorCreatorType: string

Unique identifier for this asset's creator.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ createdDate root allOf Base Asset Properties createdDateCreation DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was created.

updator root allOf Base Asset Properties updatorUpdatorType: string

Unique identifier for the user that most recently updated this asset.

Must match regular expression: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$ updatedDate root allOf Base Asset Properties updatedDateLast Updated DateType: stringFormat: date-time

Datetime when this asset was most recently updated.

root allOf CDM Properties modelAssets Decision Asset allOf Decision Asset PropertiesDecision Asset PropertiesType: object assetData root allOf CDM Properties modelAssets Decision Asset allOf Decision Asset Properties assetDataType: object

Data associated with this decision asset.

The following properties are required:
  • name
  • assetData
Conditional Subschema

If the conditions in the "If" tab are respected, then the conditions in the "Then" tab should be respected. Otherwise, the conditions in the "Else" tab should be respected.

  • If
  • Then
root ifType: object status root if statusType: const Specific value: "Custom" root thenType: object The following properties are required:
  • customStatus
The following properties are required:
  • name
  • summary
  • status
  • version
  • partialRetrieval
  • elements
  • dependencies
  • modelAssets

Generated using json-schema-for-humans on 2024-06-28 at 18:08:44 +0000

docs.title: Test Data
docs.text:
The following example data adheres to the OpenDI JSON Schema

{
    "$schema": "./schema-draft.json",
    "uuid": "28eefdc9-d38c-458d-a0b1-cba3706a09e4",
    "name": "Example/Test Model",
    "summary": "An example CDM for testing/demonstrating the CDM JSON schema.",
    "status": "Draft",
    "version": "0.0.1",
    "partialRetrieval": null,

    "elements": [
        {
            "uuid": "16283e16-9c8e-4971-ad58-4d3b92066223",
            "name": "An action",
            "type": "Lever",
            "evaluation": {
                "defaultValue": 1
            },
            "diagram": {
                "position": {
                    "x": 10,
                    "y": 10
                },
                "boundingBoxSize": {
                    "width": 400,
                    "height": 300
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "uuid": "ea9ea804-2de2-46ea-b0eb-f08d7649c215",
            "name": "Another action",
            "type": "Lever",
            "evaluation": {
                "defaultValue": 0
            },
            "diagram": {
                "position": {
                    "x": 10,
                    "y": 400
                },
                "boundingBoxSize": {
                    "width": 400,
                    "height": 300
                }
            },
            "assets": ["082b9bf0-a61b-4a45-bea2-fd7c4c8f360e"]
        },
        {
            "uuid": "6a6fa173-7bff-4913-9f5b-5da98075302e",
            "name": "An outcome",
            "type": "Outcome",
            "evaluation": {
                "defaultValue": null
            },
            "diagram": {
                "position": {
                    "x": 500,
                    "y": 10
                },
                "boundingBoxSize": {
                    "width": 400,
                    "height": 300
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "uuid": "42856efc-35f4-4772-9c5c-ad6c6ba8e419",
            "name": "A constraint",
            "type": "Custom",
            "customType": "Constraint",
            "evaluation": {
                "valueExpression": "ea9ea804-2de2-46ea-b0eb-f08d7649c215 < 16283e16-9c8e-4971-ad58-4d3b92066223",
                "defaultValue": false
            },
            "diagram": {
                "position": {
                    "x": 10,
                    "y": 800
                },
                "boundingBoxSize": {
                    "width": 400,
                    "height": 300
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "uuid": "0149ba61-d680-4700-a161-682a60e81fd7",
            "name": "An eval-only example element",
            "type": "Custom",
            "customType": "Eval Only",
            "evaluation": {
                "defaultValue": null
            }
        },
        {
            "uuid": "c0d51c2e-3063-4637-8db7-c5d5f6779736",
            "name": "A diagram-only example element",
            "type": "Custom",
            "customType": "Diagram Only",
            "diagram": {
                "position": {
                    "x": 500,
                    "y": 400
                },
                "boundingBoxSize": {
                    "width": 400,
                    "height": 300
                }
            }
        }
    ],

    "dependencies": [
        {
            "uuid": "0bb28923-5ef4-483c-af32-1bea58732614",
            "source": "16283e16-9c8e-4971-ad58-4d3b92066223",
            "target": "6a6fa173-7bff-4913-9f5b-5da98075302e",
            "assets": ["75e1974a-e5e4-4726-85b3-cb3d86b843be"]
        },
        {
            "uuid": "d2d0e096-9d45-41e9-9a47-3a4791895fc0",
            "source": "ea9ea804-2de2-46ea-b0eb-f08d7649c215",
            "target": "6a6fa173-7bff-4913-9f5b-5da98075302e"
        },
        {
            "uuid": "e3709be0-ea19-41d9-b7c4-7cc602117c27",
            "source": "42856efc-35f4-4772-9c5c-ad6c6ba8e419",
            "target": "ea9ea804-2de2-46ea-b0eb-f08d7649c215"
        }
    ],

    "modelAssets": [
        {
            "uuid": "75e1974a-e5e4-4726-85b3-cb3d86b843be",
            "name": "Test asset for dependency",
            "assetData": {
                "comment": "Not sure what goes in here yet!"
            }
        },
        {
            "uuid": "082b9bf0-a61b-4a45-bea2-fd7c4c8f360e",
            "name": "Test asset for decision element",
            "assetData": {
                "comment": "Not sure what goes in here yet, either!"
            }
        }
    ]

}
